One can also note that other noncarbon-based single-atom catalysts have also been proposed for CO 2RR applications. For example, Sun et al. reported on singly dispersed Ir-based catalyst on a Î±-Co(OH) 2 support showing high selectivity toward CO production. In this case, the analysis of operando XANES data confirmed the predominantly oxidized state of the Ir species and its stability under reaction conditions. The high dispersion of the Ir species was confirmed by EXAFS data analysis.
